title: XE (XtremeMeasures) Looking for a brand new roster for the new Season!

embed.description: 100 likes will be nice! Click this link below to add us to your subscribtion,help us to 6k! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=TheXtremeHQ Discount code "Xtreme8" for 5%...

body:
XtremeMeasures is a new team looking for the best of the best to represent Xtreme. We are currently looking for all 5 roles ( Adc, Jungle, Support, Mid, Top )
First off i would like to say that Xtreme is a partner of XE Sniping which their link will be linked below and they have 5k on Youtube and we will be posting videos on Youtube and streaming weekly so if you are into doing that then this team is great for you, however if you are not a streamer or if you don't record don't be discouraged because you still want you to be about of XE. We will only be judging based off of skill so do not worry about your rank, if you feel like you have the ability to make this team then feel free to post a response. The only thing we are asking is that you have a mic and that you can play at least 5 days a week. If you are interested in joining please post a response with the following information and if we are interested we will contact you.
Age:
Role:
Best Champions:
Rank:
IGN:
Why do you want to join XE?
